title: Ticket #1479: Add # of jobs on hold to DAGMan status
description:
In the dagman.out file, where we output status like this: 

  Done     Pre   Queued    Post   Ready   Un-Ready   Failed
   ===     ===      ===     ===     ===        ===      ===
     4       0        0       0       0          0        0

we should also add info about how many jobs are currently on hold.
remarks:
2010-Jul-01 16:25:46 by wenger:
Code is now done -- I just need to add something to the version history.

2010-Jul-09 12:57:18 by wenger:
Ah, I did add this to the version history at some point, so I'm going to close this ticket.

2010-Jul-31 11:56:55 by matt:
Kent, there's no commit associated with this ticket. Was the code changed? If so, in what version?

2010-Aug-02 11:38:06 by wenger:
Commit was this: 

  commit 1078e1b7f637f933745f31f995bd142680606adb
  Author: Kent Wenger <wenger@cs.wisc.edu>
  Date:   Thu Jul 1 16:22:48 2010 -0500


      Gittrac # 1479: DAG status in the dagman.out file now includes the
      number of job procs that are on hold.

I guess either the capital "G" or the space after the # goofed things up...
creator: wenger
